title: Implementation of Decisions and Recommendations of the Presidential Commission of Inquiry to Investigate and Inquire into and Obtain Information
decision_details: - H.E the President has appointed a Presidential Commission of Inquiry to investigate and inquire into and obtain information in relation to alleged victimizations of Public Officers, Employees of Public Corporations, Members of Armed Forces and Police Service, who were holding posts during the period commencing from 08th January 2015 and ending on 16th November 2019. The Report of the said Commission has been submitted by H.E the President. Accordingly, the proposal made by H.E the President to submit the said report in Parliament and to take necessary action to implement the decisions and recommendations of the said Report, was approved by the Cabinet.
